= Commands =
* *$mod + f*
- fullscreen mode

* *$mod + e*
- toggle vertical and horizonal window modes

* *$mod + w*
- tabbed mode

* *$mod + Shift + q*
- kill a window

== Workspaces ==    
    * *$mod + [num]*
    - move to _numth_ workspace

    * *$mod + Shift + [num]*
    - move focues window to _numth_ workspace
    
* *$mod + Shift + c*
- restarting i3 inplace

* *$mode + Shift + e*
- exit i3
